title: Okta in October: Time to Act on Some Pummeled Cloud Stocks
text:
It's time to get working on some beaten-down cloud namesOkta, Inc(OKTA) is one of my favorites in the group, and I know Jim Cramer likes it as wellThe shares a breaking higher out of a bearish channel formed over the rough month of SeptemberThe huge push in the Full Stochastics created a strong bullish divergence in front of price, which appears t...

description: Time to Act on Some Pummeled Cloud Stocks and Okta Is First on My List
authors: Time To Act On Some Pummeled Cloud Stocks
